name: Best Snake Game Fast Javascript
description:
Snake Game Javascript

Game* created for study purposes, recreation of the classic Snake Game. Programming language in Pure Javascript (JSVanilla). No framework, library or engine was used. Audios and effects are free content.

[Controls]
Keyboard Arrows
Keyboard W, A, S, D
Enter or spacebar
